title: raamaa pAhi
sahitya:
rAma pAhi mEghashyAma pAhi guNadhAma mAm pAhi O rAma

caraNam 1

 mUdu lOkamulalO IDu lEdani ninnu vEDu koNTini nEnu O rAma
   
caraNam 2

 lOkula neranammu kOkanE nIkE lOkuva nEnaitini O rAma
   
caraNam 3

 EvELa nApAli dEvAdi dEvuDu nIvE anukoNTini O rAma
   
caraNam 4

 anni kallalani ninnE nijamanu konnavADa naitini O rAma
   
caraNam 5

 talaci nantanE mEnu pulakarincaga nIpai valaci nI vADanaiti O rAma
   
caraNam 6

 durjana gaNamula vajincuTaka nAma garjana gatiyanTini O rAma
   
caraNam 7

 manasuna nitya nUtanamaina cakkani tanamunu kanugoNTini O rAma
   
caraNam 8

 avanisutAdhava bhAvamuna evvari kevaru lEdanu koNTini O rAma
   
caraNam 9

 manci krtyamuu nI kancu incitina panca bhUtamu sAkSiga O rAma
 
caraNam 10

 vanaja nayana nA vacanamulella satyamanucu yAlakincumi O rAma
 
caraNam 11

 ika naina shankara shuka brahmAnanda sukha sAgara brOvumi O rAma
 
caraNam 12

 AjAnubhAvu sarAjAnana tyAgarAja sannuta carita O rAma
